subject: Coma
Sports Injuries
Boxing
Violence (Media and Entertainment)
Concussions
lead_paragraph: As a Russian heavyweight named Magomed Abdusalamov lay unconscious in a Manhattan hospital, people involved in the sport tried to explain opportunity and risk in boxing.
